name: Ghost Guns
description:
Ghost Guns is an intense, fast-pace and pretty hardcore shooter game. It is fun, easy to learn and addicting. Defeat the evilyet cute ghosts, survive countless waves of enemies and break your highscore. Will you be able to defeat the ghost army?

So whats going on?
  • Ghosts are invading our world and it is up to you to stop them
  • 4 different levels
  • A big selection of different weapons
  • Basically infinte waves of enemies
  • Enemies will grow over time
  • Fun game design
  • A fast, intuitive and very addicting gameplay
  • Defeat the mad ghost army
  • Beat your highscore
  • Survive the ghost war
